gt_lyric: [intro-short] ; [verse] Late night. black tint. skrrt in the lane. Streetlights flicker. heartbeat and chain. Low talk. cold grin. trust is thin. Trap drums knock. let the night begin. Back block. back gate. smoke in the air. No handouts here. just pressure and prayer. We move quiet. ride heavy. never snitch. Stack it. flip it. cold on the switch. ; [chorus] Ride low. eyes cold. 808s shake. City on fire but we never break. From the stoop to the skyline. we survive. Real talk. street code. we alive. ; [inst-short] ; [verse] Palm on the wheel. gold teeth flash. Wrong turn. wrong look. we never crash. Same crew. same rules. keep it tight. Hustle all day. grind all night. ; [chorus] Ride low. eyes cold. 808s shake. City on fire but we never break. From the stoop to the skyline. we survive. Real talk. street code. we alive. ; [outro-short]

[intro-short] ; [verse] Neon rain. bright lights. you and me. Quick smile. fast beat. set me free. Hold tight. spin around. feel the spark. This is our moment. let it show. ; [inst-short] ; [verse] Late night. long drive. windows down. Radio. our song. we own this town. ; [chorus] We go up. we glow. like a city in the night.
